p: All experiments with live H9N2 viruses were performed at enhanced Biosafety Level 3+ (BSL3+) in Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine. All studies with recombinant DNA were conducted under the relevant laws in Japan and approved by the Biological Safety Committee of Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine (Approval number 30â€“104) after risk assessments were conducted by the Living Modified Organisms Committee of Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine and, when required, by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan.
